comments: A manuscript written between 1935 and 1955 was not published until 1981 in Bull. Brit. Mus. (Nat. Hist.), Bot. 9(4): 233-330. Similarly Isoetaceae in Flora Malesiana, series 2. Pteridophytes, vol. 1.  62-64 (1982).
examples: Selaginella cheiromorpha Alston in Bull. Brit. Mus. (Nat. Hist.), Bot., 9(4): 257 (1981). Daedalacanthus fastigiatus Alston in Ann. Roy. Bot. Gard. Peradeniya, 11: 299 (1930).
